H0.text: Oil is considered an inexhaustible resource.

H1.text: Topsoil would be considered an inexhaustible resource.

H2.text: Sunlight is considered an inexhaustible resource.

A4.text: Renewable energy refers to the provision of energy via renewable resources which are naturally replenished as fast as they are being used. Examples are sunlight, wind, biomass, rain, tides, waves and geothermal heat.
